name: kill or dead
description: Kill or Dead is a third-person combat game - one of the features of the game is that it is completely free and does not need any fees from you to start playing - There are also all the categories of weapons that give the challenge between the players - You can also create your own room to play you and your friends - The game supports online play - Also you can choose a character within the game to be distinguished between your minutes - The game is excellent Enjoy.
